turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a Grande cafe latte from Starbucks, please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, which store would you like to order from

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The store that's closest

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So the one on 1068 Chapel Street.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure, if that's the closest

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like milk and sugar?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, both, with non-fat milk please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Why not 2% milk, as it's the default?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's fine, I'm trying to cut down on fat.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I understand

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Does the Latte have nuts? I'm allergic

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The website says they can't guarantee there aren't hints of nuts

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok, but the Latte itself doesn't have nuts?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Does it come with whipped cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm not seeing it as an option, no

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok. I'll take that then

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your latte will be ready for pickup shortly and your receipt will be sent to your phone through text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem
